channel.title: CVE Feed for freedesktop.org -- spice-gtk
channel.description: The latest CVEs for freedesktop.org -- spice-gtk

item.title: CVE-2017-12194|2024-08-05T18:28:16.674Z -- freedesktop.org -- spice-gtk
item.description: A flaw was found in the way spice-client processed certain messages sent from the server. An attacker, having control of malicious spice-server, could use this flaw to crash the client or execute arbitrary code with permissions of the user running the client. spice-gtk versions through 0.34 are believed to be vulnerable.
